about_the_game:
It’s a Friday night on campus, and it feels like you’re the only student with nothing to do! Even worse your goth roommate (and secrete crush) Madeline says she won’t even let you into your own shared dorm room!

Will you be able to convince your cranky co-ed to go out tonight? Find out in this new game for Super Woot-boy! Featuring blast processing, over ten shades of green, and art by W-oo-t. This spooky adventure features attitude that’s anything but pocket sized!

About This Game
A single player comedic visual novel, created with the Twine engine. This story is based on previous character art from W-OO-T and writing from Soylent Orange. You'll explore the relatively small side of a student dorm, as you try to keep your demanding goth roomie happy. Solve puzzles, buy snacks!

Key Features:
Multiple Endings depending on player choices, including a "bad-ending!"
Complete soundtrack composed with that retro 1993 portable system sound.

content_descriptors.notes: Female nudity is involved with this game.  Consensual sex is a possibility in one of the endings to this game. Swear words are used throughout this game.

name: Big Tiddy Goth GF Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Window 7
  • Processor: 1 gigahertz
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Microsoft DirectX 9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Virtual

short_description: Explore the college campus, and work your way up to telling the goth girl you have a crush on how you REALLY feel. Solve puzzles, buy food, and explore a eerily empty dorm.
